name: Knockout League - Arcade VR Boxing
description: Welcome to Knockout League, a single player arcade-style boxing game built from the ground up for virtual reality. Dodge flaming uppercuts, block sweeping tentacle attacks, and pummel your opponents using 1:1 tracking of your head and hands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7  SP1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX980, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 7 GB available space
